sync::rcu::non_null::either::remove_bits.doc:
# Safety

 The caller must ensure that removing the bits from the non-null pointer will result in another
 non-null pointer.

sync::rcu::non_null::NonNullPtr::raw_as_.doc:
Obtains a shared reference to the original pointer.

 # Safety

 The original pointer must outlive the lifetime parameter `'a`, and during `'a`
 no mutable references to the pointer will exist.
